A triple [latex]${C}(O, M, \circ)$[/latex] where

  • [latex]$o \in O, \exists id_o \in M$[/latex]
  • [latex]$\circ$[/latex] is defined for all connected objects
  • [latex]$\circ(A \rightarrow B, B \rightarrow C) = A \rightarrow C$[/latex]
Back:
• [latex]$(f \circ g) \circ h == f \circ (h \circ g)$[/latex]
  • [latex]$id_x \circ f = f \circ id_y$[/latex]
